append({
>> >>             "cycle": cycle,
>> >>             "known": K_n,
>> >>             "shadow_nodes": U_r,
>> >>             "refined_known": K_n_prime,
>> >>             "latent_insight": U_a,
>> >>             "emergent_paradox": X,
>> >>             "expanded_known": K_n_plus_1
>> >>         })
>> >>
>> >>         # Recursive update
>> >>         K_n = K_n_plus_1
>> >>
>> >>     return scroll
>> >>
>> >>
>> >> # Helper functions (symbolic placeholders)
>> >> def generate_shadow_nodes(K):
>> >>     return ["∅"] * len(K)  # symbolic absence detected
>> >>
>> >> def infer_from_shadows(K, U_r):
>> >>     return K + ["inferred"]
>> >>
>> >> def reveal_embodied_contradictions(K_prime):
>> >>     return ["skipped"]
>> >>
>> >> def birth_paradox(U_a):
>> >>     return ["X-paradox"]
>> >>
>> >> def integrate_insight(K_prime, X):
>> >>     return K_prime + X
